message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and the fact that it's worth $800000 to you, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. My initial offer is $950000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of your product, I would like to propose a lower price of $850000 to ensure we both achieve a satisfactory outcome.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering the value of the product to you and our previous discussions, I am willing to consider $900000 as a fair price for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $875000 for the product. This price allows us to meet somewhere in the middle while still staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I appreciate your effort to find a common ground. Based on our ongoing discussion, I am prepared to offer the product at $890000. I believe this price reflects the value of the product to you while allowing us to move forward with the transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Based on my budget constraints and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a final price of $880000. I believe this price strikes a balance between our interests.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I've considered your proposal carefully and am willing to accept $885000 for the product. I believe this price respects the value you place on the item while also closing the gap between our offers.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After reviewing our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $877500 for the product. This price aims to provide a fair compromise while staying within my budget.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I've given it careful consideration and am prepared to offer the product at $882500. I believe this price respects the value you place on the item while also reflecting the ongoing negotiations.

I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $880000 for the product. This price aims to provide a fair compromise while staying within my budget constraints.
